00020 BldParser::BldParser(GameManager* gameManager)
00021 {

00024     m_materialManager = m_gameManager->manager.material;
00025 
00026     m_meshScene = m_gameManager->parallelscene.meshs;
00027     m_lightScene = m_gameManager->parallelscene.light;
00028     m_newtonScene = m_gameManager->parallelscene.newton;

00037 inline std::string stripComments(std::string content)
00038 {
00039     for(unsigned pos = 0; (pos = content.find('#', pos)) != string::npos;)
00040         content.replace(pos, content.find('\n', pos) - pos + 1, "");
00041 
00042     return content;
00043 }

00045 bool BldParser::IsChanged()
00046 {
00047     std::stringstream newmap, oldmap;
00048 
00049     std::ifstream file(m_openFileName.c_str());
00050     oldmap << file.rdbuf();
00051 
00052     WriteMap(newmap);
00053 
00054     return stripComments(newmap.str()) != stripComments(oldmap.str());
00055 }

00057 void BldParser::SaveLevel()
00058 {
00059     SaveLevel(m_openFileName);
00060 }

00062 void BldParser::WriteMap(std::iostream& stream)
00063 {
00064     using namespace boost::posix_time;
00065 
00066     stream << "# Ball level descriptor" << endl;
00067     stream << "# Generated " << second_clock::local_time() << endl;
00068     stream << endl;
00069 
00070 
00071     stream << ".map" << endl;
00072     stream << "name=" << m_gameManager->map.name << endl;
00073     stream << "ambient=" << m_sceneManager->GetAmbientLight() << endl;
00074     stream << endl;
00075 
00076 
00077     if(!m_gameManager->map.musicPath.empty())
00078     {
00079         stream << ".music" << endl;
00080         stream << "filePath=" << m_gameManager->map.musicPath << endl;
00081         stream << endl;
00082     }
00083 
00084     Fog* fog = m_sceneManager->GetFog();
00085 
00086     if(fog->IsEnable())
00087     {
00088         stream << ".fog" << endl;
00089         stream << "color=" << fog->GetColor() << endl;
00090         stream << "start=" << fog->GetStart() << endl;
00091         stream << "end=" << fog->GetEnd() << endl;
00092         stream << endl;
00093     }
00094 
00095     SkyBox* sky = m_sceneManager->GetSkybox();
00096 
00097     if(sky->IsEnable())
00098     {
00099         Texture* skyTexs = sky->GetTextures();
00100 
00101         stream << ".skybox" << endl;
00102         stream << "front=" << skyTexs[0].GetFilename() << endl;
00103         stream << "back=" << skyTexs[1].GetFilename() << endl;
00104         stream << "top=" << skyTexs[2].GetFilename() << endl;
00105         stream << "bottom=" << skyTexs[3].GetFilename() << endl;
00106         stream << "left=" << skyTexs[4].GetFilename() << endl;
00107         stream << "right=" << skyTexs[5].GetFilename() << endl;
00108         stream << endl;
00109     }
00110 
00111     stream << "# Light" << endl;
00112     stream << endl;
00113 
00114     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_gameManager->map.lights.size(); i++)
00115     {
00116         Light* light = m_gameManager->map.lights[i];
00117 
00118         bool pointType = (light->GetType() == Light::POINT);
00119 
00120         stream << "+light" << endl;
00121         stream << "type=" << (pointType ? "POINT" : "DIRI") << endl;
00122         stream << "pos=" << light->GetPos() << endl;
00123         stream << "ambient=" << light->GetAmbient() << endl;
00124         stream << "diffuse=" << light->GetDiffuse() << endl;
00125         stream << "specular=" << light->GetSpecular() << endl;
00126         if(pointType)
00127             stream << "radius=" << light->GetRadius() << endl;
00128         stream << endl;
00129     }
00130 
00131     stream << "# Static" << endl;
00132     stream << endl;
00133 
00134     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_gameManager->map.staticObjects.size(); i++)
00135         m_gameManager->map.staticObjects[i]->OutputConstruction(stream);
00136 
00137     stream << "# Dynamic" << endl;
00138     stream << endl;
00139 
00140     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_gameManager->map.dynamicObjects.size(); i++)
00141         m_gameManager->map.dynamicObjects[i]->OutputConstruction(stream);
00142 
00143     stream << "# Item" << endl;
00144     stream << endl;
00145 
00146     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_gameManager->map.items.size(); i++)
00147         m_gameManager->map.items[i]->OutputConstruction(stream);
00148 
00149     stream << "# Spawn" << endl;
00150     stream << endl;
00151 
00152     for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_gameManager->map.spawnPoints.size(); i++)
00153     {
00154         stream << "+node" << endl;
00155         stream << "type=SPAWN" << endl;
00156         stream << "pos=" << m_gameManager->map.spawnPoints[i] << endl;
00157         stream << endl;
00158     }
00159 }

00161 void BldParser::SaveLevel(const std::string& filepath)
00162 {
00163     fstream file(filepath.c_str(), ios::out);
00164 
00165     if(!file)
00166         throw tbe::Exception("BldParser::SaveLevel; Open file error (%s)", filepath.c_str());
00167 
00168     m_openFileName = filepath;
00169 
00170     WriteMap(file);
00171 
00172     file.close();
00173 }
00174 
00175 void BldParser::LoadLevel(const std::string& filepath)
00176 {
00177     ifstream file(filepath.c_str());
00178 
00179     if(!file)
00180         throw tbe::Exception("BldParser::LoadScene; Open file error (%s)", filepath.c_str());
00181 
00182     m_openFileName = filepath;
00183 
00184     string buffer;
00185     while(tools::getline(file, buffer))
00186     {
00187         if(buffer.empty() || buffer[0] == '#')
00188             continue;
00189 
00190         if(buffer == ".map")
00191         {
00192             AttribMap att = GetAttributs(file);
00193             OnLoadMap(att);
00194         }
00195 
00196         else if(buffer == ".music")
00197         {
00198             AttribMap att = GetAttributs(file);
00199             OnLoadMusic(att);
00200         }
00201 
00202         else if(buffer == ".fog")
00203         {
00204             AttribMap att = GetAttributs(file);
00205             OnLoadFog(att);
00206         }
00207 
00208 
00209         else if(buffer == ".skybox")
00210         {
00211             AttribMap att = GetAttributs(file);
00212             OnLoadSkyBox(att);
00213         }
00214 
00215         else if(buffer == "+node")
00216         {
00217             AttribMap att = GetAttributs(file);
00218             OnLoadNode(att);
00219         }
00220 
00221         else if(buffer == "+light")
00222         {
00223             AttribMap att = GetAttributs(file);
00224             OnLoadLight(att);
00225         }
00226 
00227         else
00228             throw tbe::Exception("BldParser::LoadScene; Parse error (%s)", buffer.c_str());
00229     }
00230 
00231     file.close();
00232 }

00235 {
00236     this->m_openFileName = openFileName;
00237 }

00239 std::string BldParser::GetOpenFileName() const
00240 {
00241     return m_openFileName;
00242 }
00243 
00244 BldParser::AttribMap BldParser::GetAttributs(std::ifstream& file)
00245 {
00246     BldParser::AttribMap fileMap;
00247     string buffer;
00248 
00249     while(tools::getline(file, buffer))
00250     {
00251         if(buffer.empty())
00252             break;
00253 
00254         if(buffer[0] == '#')
00255             continue;
00256 
00257         string key(buffer, 0, buffer.find_first_of('=')),
00258                 value(buffer, buffer.find_first_of('=') + 1);
00259 
00260         fileMap[key] = value;
00261     }
00262 
00263     return fileMap;
00264 }

00266 void BldParser::OnLoadMap(AttribMap& att)
00267 {
00268     m_gameManager->map.name = att["name"];
00269     m_sceneManager->SetAmbientLight(tools::StrToVec4<float>(att["ambient"], true));
00270 }
00271 
00272 void BldParser::OnLoadMusic(AttribMap& att)
00273 {
00274     string& filePath = att["filePath"];
00275     m_gameManager->map.musicPath = filePath;
00276 
00277     if(!m_gameManager->manager.app->globalSettings.noaudio
00278        && !m_gameManager->manager.app->globalSettings.nomusic)
00279     {
00280         FMOD_RESULT res = FMOD_System_CreateStream(m_fmodsys, filePath.c_str(),
00281                                                    FMOD_LOOP_NORMAL | FMOD_2D | FMOD_HARDWARE,
00282                                                    0, &m_gameManager->map.musicStream);
00283 
00284         if(res != FMOD_OK)
00285             throw Exception("BldParser::OnLoadMusic; %s (%s)",
00286                             FMOD_ErrorString(res), filePath.c_str());
00287     }
00288 }

00290 void BldParser::OnLoadFog(AttribMap& att)
00291 {
00292     Vector4f color = tools::StrToVec4<float>(att["color"], true);
00293     float start = tools::StrToNum<float>(att["start"]);
00294     float end = tools::StrToNum<float>(att["end"]);
00295 
00296     scene::Fog* fog = m_sceneManager->GetFog();
00297     fog->SetColor(color);
00298     fog->SetStart(start);
00299     fog->SetEnd(end);
00300     fog->SetEnable(true);
00301 }
00302 
00303 void BldParser::OnLoadSkyBox(AttribMap& att)
00304 {
00305     string skyPath[6] = {
00306         att["front"], att["back"],
00307         att["top"], att["bottom"],
00308         att["left"], att["right"]
00309     };
00310 
00311     Texture skyTex[6];
00312 
00313     for(unsigned i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00314         if(!skyPath[i].empty())
00315             skyTex[i] = skyPath[i];
00316 
00317     scene::SkyBox * sky = m_sceneManager->GetSkybox();
00318     sky->SetTextures(skyTex);
00319     sky->SetEnable(true);
00320 }
00321 
00322 void BldParser::OnLoadNode(AttribMap& att)
00323 {
00324     Node* node = 0;
00325 
00326     if(att["type"] == "ITEM")
00327         node = CreateItem(att["add"], att["matrix"]);
00328 
00329     else if(att["type"] == "DYNAMIC")
00330         node = CreateDynamic(att["action"], att["matrix"]);
00331 
00332     else if(att["type"] == "STATIC")
00333         node = CreateStatic(att["modelPath"], att["matrix"]);
00334 
00335     else if(att["type"] == "SPAWN")
00336         m_gameManager->map.spawnPoints.push_back(tools::StrToVec3<float>(att["pos"], true));
00337 
00338     else
00339         throw tbe::Exception("BldParser::OnLoadNode; Unknown node type (%s)", att["type"].c_str());
00340 
00341     if(node)
00342         m_gameManager->manager.scene->GetRootNode()->AddChild(node);
00343 }
00344 
00345 void BldParser::OnLoadLight(AttribMap& att)
00346 {
00347     Light* light = NULL;
00348 
00349     if(att["type"] == "DIRI")
00350     {
00351         light = new DiriLight(m_lightScene);
00352     }
00353 
00354     else if(att["type"] == "POINT")
00355     {
00356         float radius = tools::StrToNum<float>(att["radius"]);
00357 
00358         light = new PointLight(m_lightScene);
00359         light->SetRadius(radius);
00360     }
00361 
00362     else
00363         throw tbe::Exception("BldParser::LoadScene; Unknown light type (%s)", att["type"].c_str());
00364 
00365     light->SetPos(tools::StrToVec3<float>(att["pos"], true));
00366 
00367     light->SetAmbient(tools::StrToVec4<float>(att["ambient"], true));
00368     light->SetDiffuse(tools::StrToVec4<float>(att["diffuse"], true));
00369     light->SetSpecular(tools::StrToVec4<float>(att["specular"], true));
00370 
00371     m_gameManager->manager.scene->GetRootNode()->AddChild(light);
00372     m_gameManager->map.lights.push_back(light);
00373 }
00374 
00375 Item* BldParser::CreateItem(std::string add, tbe::Matrix4f pos)
00376 {
00377     Item* item;
00378 
00379     if(add == "AMMO")
00380         item = new ItemAddAmmo(m_gameManager, pos);
00381 
00382     else if(add == "LIFE")
00383         item = new ItemAddLife(m_gameManager, pos);
00384 
00385     else if(add == "FATALSHOT")
00386         item = new ItemFatalShot(m_gameManager, pos);
00387 
00388     else if(add == "SUPERLIFE")
00389         item = new ItemSuperLife(m_gameManager, pos);
00390 
00391     else if(add == "FINDER")
00392         item = new ItemAddFinder(m_gameManager, pos);
00393 
00394     else if(add == "BOMB")
00395         item = new ItemAddBomb(m_gameManager, pos);
00396 
00397     else if(add == "SHOTGUN")
00398         item = new ItemAddShotgun(m_gameManager, pos);
00399 
00400     else
00401         throw tbe::Exception("LevelLoader::OnLoadNode; Unknown item add (%s)", add.c_str());
00402 
00403     m_gameManager->RegisterItem(item);
00404 
00405     return item;
00406 }

00408 DynamicObject* BldParser::CreateDynamic(std::string action, tbe::Matrix4f pos)
00409 {
00410     DynamicObject* dyo;
00411 
00412     if(action == "JUMPER")
00413         dyo = new DYJumper(m_gameManager, pos);
00414 
00415     else if(action == "TELEPORTER")
00416         dyo = new DYTeleporter(m_gameManager, pos);
00417 
00418     else
00419         throw tbe::Exception("LevelLoader::OnLoadNode; Unknown dynamic action (%s)", action.c_str());
00420 
00421     m_gameManager->RegisterDynamic(dyo);
00422 
00423     return dyo;
00424 }

00426 StaticObject* BldParser::CreateStatic(std::string modelPath, tbe::Matrix4f pos)
00427 {
00428     StaticObject* node = new StaticObject(m_gameManager, modelPath, pos);
00429 
00430     m_gameManager->RegisterStatic(node);
00431 
00432     return node;
00433 }
